title: BRIEF-Primero Group Gets EPC Contract By Rio Tinto For Work At West Angelas Project
text:
BRIEF-Primero Group Gets EPC Contract By Rio Tinto For Work At West Angelas Project

Commodities 8 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 12:42)

BRIEF-Primero Group Gets EPC Contract By Rio Tinto For Work At West Angelas Project Oct 17 (Reuters) - Primero Group: * AWARDED EPC CONTRACT BY KALIUM LAKES FOR DESIGN, PROCUREMENT AND CONSTRUCTION OF BEYONDIE SOP PROJECT GAS INLET AND DELIVERY STATIONS * GETS EPC CONTRACT BY RIO TINTO FOR COMMISSIONING OF HEAVY VEHICLE REFUELING & DIESEL PIPELINE INFRASTRUCTURE AT WEST ANGELAS PROJECT

BRIEF-Primero Group Gets EPC Contract By Rio Tinto For Work At West Angelas Project
description: BRIEF-Primero Group Gets EPC Contract By Rio Tinto For Work At West Angelas Project
